data.name: Sample - GOGETSSL - 1.0.0
data.description: GOGETSSL offers SSL/TLS certificates and digital security solutions to secure websites, emails, and networks. With this connector, users can enhance security, streamline certificate management, and ensure trusted encryption for online communications

workflows.description: Retrieve information about alternative domain names associated with a specific SSL/TLS certificate.
workflows.name: Get Domain Alternative

workflows.description: Retrieve email addresses associated with a specific domain.
workflows.name: Get Domain Emails

workflows.description: Retrieve email addresses associated with a domain specifically for GeoTrust SSL certificates.
workflows.name: Get Domain Emails for Geo Trust

arguments.title: GOGETSSL: Get Domain Emails for Geo Trust

steps.name: Get Domain Emails for Geo Trust

arguments.name: GOGETSSL
arguments.operationTitle: Get Domain Emails for Geo Trust

routes.name: Start-> Get Domain Emails for Geo Trust

workflows.description: Retrieve WHOIS information for a specific domain.
workflows.name: Get Domain from Whois

workflows.description: Retrieving details of a specific product from GOGETSSL.
workflows.name: Get Product Details

workflows.description: Retrieves common details about the order's status and associated metadata, helping you track and manage your SSL certificate orders.
workflows.name: Get Orders Metadata

workflows.description: Retrieve comprehensive details about a specific SSL certificate order.
workflows.name: Get Orders Details

workflows.description: Retrieve the status of all SSL certificate orders associated with your account.
workflows.name: Get All Orders Status

workflows.description: Retrieves the total number of SSL certificate orders associated with your account.
workflows.name: Get Total Order Count

workflows.description: Generate a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) based on the provided parameter values.
workflows.name: Generate CSR

workflows.description: Add an SSL certificate order in GOGETSSL
workflows.name: Add SSL Order

workflows.description: Request a reissue of an existing SSL certificate.
workflows.name: Reissue SSL Order

workflows.description: Renewal process for an existing SSL certificate.
workflows.name: Add SSL Renew Order

workflows.description: Add an SSL certificate with Subject Alternative Names (SANs) to secure multiple domains or subdomains with a single certificate, ideal for Multi-Domain (MD) or Unified Communications (UCC) use.
workflows.name: Add SSL SAN Order

workflows.description: Cancel a previously placed SSL certificate order.
workflows.name: Cancel Order
